title: How to write a speech about myself in 1 minute - Quora

response.answer_text: Wait….Before we dive into how to write a speech about self in 1minute,let’s be clear 60 seconds can bring a lot of joy in the audience. One way we normally can do is like ‘Myself’of UKG where we go with the flow and share our name ,what to we do and goes on. But if you really want to capture the audience with your speech then let’s get creative,few of the ideas could be 1.Telling a story which will tell about you in an indirect way. 2. Making words sound poetic to feel interesting. Hope this helps! Thank you:-)

Hi, You are the person, who know you better than others. Take a piece of paper and write the best things which you did in your life. Any help, related to achievements etc. Mention your strengths and capabilities and if you are working mention your profile. People should listen to you, so be innovative. I mean don't tell general things. Here is the list: Name and Highest EducationPassionate about and Achievements if any.Strengths and Capabilities.
